Overall a very fun game to play with your friends! Especially the workshop maps, they give you alot of freedom to choose.
Playing Bhop, kz and surf maps made the game 10x better and made me a better movement player myself. Trying the steam community market made me feel more like a businessman rather than a gamer. The trading feature was a necessity for me because that's where people make the most profit of. Playing custom maps made the game more fun than ever! I sometimes play Cops 'n Robbers maps with friends and playing it for tens of hours. Overall a fun game to play except that the matchmaking system really sucked and the vac anticheat wasn't much effective against cheaters and smurfs. Also the anti-gambling law in Belgium wouldn't let me allow to open csgo cases, which really pissed me off.
